text: Maria Jose de Pablo Fernandez, also known as Cote de Pablo (born November 12, 1979 in Santiago, Chile), is a Chilean-American actress and singer. She is best known for her role as Ziva David on the television series NCIS.Mason, Dave, "De Pablo adds spice to 'NCIS'", The San Diego Union-Tribune, January 3, 2006. Retrieved February 11, 2013. After she left in season 11, Cote appeared in The 33, a movie about the Chilean mining disaster. == References == Category:American television actors Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Santiago Category:Singers from Santiago Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Cote de Pablo
